long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Basket Bros: A Pixel Art Basketball Game for One-on-One Showdowns with Basketball Stars!

Welcome to Basket Bros, a pixel art basketball game where you have the opportunity to go head-to-head with basketball stars and experience the passion and challenge of basketball!

Key Features:

Real Stars: In Basket Bros, you'll compete against real basketball stars! From LeBron James to Kobe Bryant, this game brings together a lineup of legendary figures from the basketball world. Each star has their own unique skills and traits, so challenge them and see if you can defeat the giants of the basketball court!
Easy to Pick Up: Basket Bros features simple controls that make it easy for anyone to jump right in. With just a few keys on your keyboard, you can perform actions like shooting, dribbling, and defense. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced player, you can enjoy fast-paced basketball showdowns in the game!

Extension Button Menu
*Play more games and explore exciting themes on the page menu buttons.
